scripts.build:web: echo '🔨 Building webapp...' && cd web-library && npm run build && echo '📁 Copying web content to assets...' && rm -rf ../assets/web-content && mkdir -p ../assets/web-content && cp -R dist/* ../assets/web-content/ && echo '✅ Web content copied to assets' && cd ..
scripts.build:android: echo '🔨 Building webapp...' && npm run build:web && cd web-library && npm run build && cd .. && echo '📁 Copying web content to android assets...' && rm -rf android/app/src/main/assets/web-content && mkdir -p android/app/src/main/assets/web-content && cp -R assets/web-content/* android/app/src/main/assets/web-content/ && echo '✅ Web content copied to android assets' && echo '🏗️ Building Android APK...' && rm -rf android/.expo .expo .expo-shared && npx expo prebuild && node scripts/disableRtl.js && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease && cd .. && mkdir -p builds && cp android/app/build/outputs/apk/release/app-release.apk builds/smart-calc.apk && echo '✅ APK saved to ./builds/smart-calc.apk'
